abusinessl: Ophir Energy PLC is engaged in the crude petroleum and natural gas services business. It is an oil and gas exploration and production company. It has offices in Malabo - Equatorial Guinea, Dar es Salaam and Mtwara-Tanzania and Dakar-Senegal. The Company was founded in February 2004 and is located in London, the United Kingdom.

abusinessl: Kansai Nerolac Paints Ltd is a manufacturer of paints and coatings. It also distributes paints and coatings. The Company offers a range of products, including decorative, Automotive Coatings and Performance coatings. The Company serves its customers through a network of four manufacturing facilities located at Lote in Maharashtra, Bawal in Haryana, Jainpur in Uttar Pradesh and Hosur in Tamil Nadu and over hundred strategically located depots. The Company has a joint venture in Nepal with Kansai Nepal, which caters to customers in Nepal. KNPL also has a joint venture in Sri Lanka with Capital Holdings Maharaja Group to set up the paint business in Sri Lanka. The Company was founded in 1920 and is located in Mumbai, India.
tbusinessl: Rak Paints Pvt Ltd is a manufacturer of coatings. The Company is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

abusinessl: Japan Tobacco Inc, located in Minato-Ku Tokyo, Japan, is engaged in the tobacco business. The Company operates in four businesses. The Japanese Domestic Tobacco business is engaged in the manufacture and sale of cigarette products in Japan, the delivery of the Company's products, the wholesale and sale of imported tobacco products, as well as the manufacture of material products. The International Tobacco business manufactures and sells cigarette products overseas. The Pharmaceutical business is engaged in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of pharmaceutical products. The Food business beverages, processed foods, and seasonings. The Company was founded in 1985.
tbusinessl: United Dhaka Tobacco Co Ltd is a manufacturer and seller of cigarettes. The Company is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

abusinessl: Mitsubishi Corp, located in Chiyoda-Ku Tokyo, Japan, is engaged in manufacturer and wholesale business. The New Industrial Finance segment is involved in asset management, buyout investment, leasing and financing of real estate and others. The Energy segment provides petroleum products, crude oil, and others. The Metal segment offers steel products and others. The Machinery segment manufactures industrial machinery, automobiles, and others. The Chemical segment manufactures petrochemicals, fertilizers, foodstuff, drugs, and others. The Living Essentials segment provides distribution services. On August 19, 2013, M2 Communications reported that Mitsubishi Corp announced it had acquired from EDF Energies Nouvelles 50% interest in the companies. The Company was founded in 1950.
tbusinessl: Summit LNG Terminal Co (Pvt) Ltd is a natural gas distributor. The Company is located in Bangladesh.

abusinessl: Norfund SA is a financial sponsor. The firm seeks to invest in clean energy, financial institutions, green infrastructure, and scalable enterprises. It invests in companies that will contribute to economic and social development through: the direct and indirect jobs they provide, the goods and services they offer and the taxes they pay. The Company was founded in 1997 and is located in Oslo, Norway.
tbusinessl: Mutual Trust Bank Ltd is a commercial bank. The Company operates through its Head Office at Dhaka and 95 branches. The Company carries out international business through a Global Network of Foreign Correspondent Banks. The Company was founded in 1999 and is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh.
Shohoz Ltd is an internet portal operator. The Company is located in Bangladesh.

abusinessl: Unilever PLC is a consumer goods (FMCG) company. The Company's segments include Personal Care, which primarily includes sales of skin care and hair care products, deodorants and oral care products; Foods, which primarily includes sales of soups, bouillons, sauces, snacks, mayonnaise, salad dressings and margarines; Home Care, which home care products, such as powders, liquids and capsules, soap bars and a range of cleaning products, and Refreshment, which ice cream and tea-based beverages. The Company's geographical segments include Asia/AMET/RUB, The Americas and Europe. Its brands include Axe, Dirt is Good (Omo), Dove, Hellmann's, Knorr, Lipton, Lux, Magnum, Rexona, Sunsilk and Surf. The Company operates in more than 100 countries, selling its products in more than 190 countries. The Company operates approximately 310 factories in over 70 countries. The Company also operates as a holding company. The Company was founded in September, 1929 and is located in London, the United Kingdom.
tbusinessl: GlaxoSmithKline Bangladesh Ltd is a manufacturer of pharmaceutical preparation. The Company operates in two segments: Pharmaceuticals and Consumer healthcare. Its dermatological products range from prescription, aesthetic and consumer healthcare dermatology products. It offers a range of vaccines, for the prevention of hepatitis A, hepatitis B, rotavirus, influenza, chickenpox, diphtheria, acellular pertussis and tetanus, among others. The Company's consumer healthcare products include Horlicks, Junior Horlicks, Women's Horlicks, Mother's Horlicks, Horlicks lite, Glaxose D and Boost. Its antibiotics brands include Ceporex, Zinnat and Cexime. Its respiratory portfolio includes Seretide and Venolin Inhaler. Its dermatological brands include Isotrex, Brevoxyl, Dermovate, Betnovet, Cutivate, Betnovate, Fluvin and Acne Aid Bar. The Company was founded in February 1974 and is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh.

abusinessl: Aviv Management Engineering & Information Systems Ltd provides business consulting and engineering services. The Company is located in Israel.
tbusinessl: Dana Engineers International Ltd is a provides engineering solution in the sector of power generation and co-generation. The Company was founded in 1972 and is located in Dhaka, Bangladesh.
